statements: DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 101 AND current_quantity < min_stock_level
DELETE FROM products WHERE max_stock_level - min_stock_level > 10
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_id = 200 AND transaction_type = 'OUT';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND (quantity_in_stock < minimum_stock_level OR maximum_stock_level < quantity_in_stock);
DELETE FROM stock_history WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name='Printer') AND timestamp < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND location_id = 2;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
